newsitem.title: UK: Vickers confirms in talks to sell unit.
newsitem.headline: Vickers confirms in talks to sell unit.

text.p: British engineering group Vickers Plc on Friday confirmed it was in "promising" talks for the possible sale of its S&W Medico Teknik unit to Sweden's Artema Medical AB.
Artema announced the talks earlier in Sweden.
"Artema is planning a new share issue in connection with the acquisition of S&W," Vickers said in its statement.
S&W forms part of Vickers' Medical Division.
